name: Barriers
description:
Help a broke teenager by donatingControls

WASD to move, ESC to pause

Concept

This is a quick game I made with the intention of something fun and fast, I wanted something that was challenging but didn't feel like the game is cheating to kill you. I liked my last concept of avoiding a lot of on screen object in Evade, but heavily disliked how it was unfair for cubes to spawn in your face, I thought that it would be cooler to have barriers coming around you and having them peek so you can have a little advantage of where they are coming.

Features
  • Fast paced gameplay
  • A lot of Fun
  • Easy to get into
  • That's
  • All
Credits

Thanks for playing my game, I hope I can upload more in the future.

Known Issues
  • Using the arrow keys moves the scroll
